meta.name: VoiceActivity
meta.description: Shows icons and info in popouts, the member list, and more when someone is in a voice channel.
meta.author: Neodymium

changelog.title: Fixed
items: Fixed plugin not working with DMs and private chats
Fixed popout section not being displayed on new popouts
Fixed ignore option not displaying in Guild context menu
Some behind-the-scenes updates like using new BdApi functions and switching to Typescript
